title: BENCH Mike Yeung, he is troling in LCS.
body: His pick alone in champ select "shyvana" a troll pick. No one picks shyvana in the lcs.

replies.body: shyvana is so busted that she went from a solo queue monster into a pro pick, very good jungle meta we have here guys
Oh her passive is non existant, but what about her dueling ?

Mike was the least of their worries.   

Mithy's foray into TL's jungle requiring Kalista ult to get out  was ill advised.   TSM ended up paying for it.    Trolleh was well trolleh .  

Welcome to NA Zven and Mithy.

Shyvanna wasn't too bad a pick.  And they got what they wanted with the two drags.  But then it fell apart in both side lanes.
There's a reason you're not in the LCS guy.
pretty sure that Shyvanna has been picked in either the LPL or LCK this week already... so your entire argument already falls flat on it's face

I may be mistaken, but I'm pretty sure people don't just "pick for themselves" in competitive play. I'm pretty sure it's a team or at least a coach decision.

So if I'm right, wouldn't putting all the blame on this guy be...wrong
